name: Мыло жидкое Чистая Линия Берёзовое для всей семьи 520мл
ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Betula Alba Juice, Betula Alba Leaf Extract, Cocamide DEA, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Parfum, Propylene Glycol, Sorbitol, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal.
